references: The right-hand side of a binomial coefficient identity in H. W. Gould, Combinatorial Identities, Morgantown, 1972.
formula: Sum {k=0..n, k^2*C(n, k)^2 }. - _Paul Barry_, Mar 04 2003a(n)=n^2*A000984(n-1). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 18 2007, corrected Jul 26 2015a(n)=n*A037965(n) - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 18 2007, corrected Jul 26 2015-(n-1)^3*a(n) +2*n^2*(2*n-3)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 26 2015
maple: seq((n+1)^2*binomial(2*n,n), n=-1..19); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 18 2007a:=n->sum(sum(binomial(2*n,n), j=0..n),k=0..n): seq(a(n), n=-1..19); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 08 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
